description:
Created by Augs SMSHacks, Super Mario Sunshine Arcade 2 is a Romhack for Super Mario Sunshine. Featuring 96 platforming gauntlets
based on mechanics and locations from the base game, the player is given the chance to experience Sunshine's mechanics in a whole
new light.

0.1.1.description:
- Fixed an issue where generating a multiworld with multiple SMSA2 slots would cause generation errors
- Updated credits
0.1.1.title: SMSA2AP Alpha 0.1.1

0.1.2.description:
- Improved generation issues with minimal accessibility. Be careful though, SMSA2 is still susceptible to the AP Core bug of generation errors when mixing full and minimal accessibility YAMLs
- Altered the random starting ticket's generation to be consistent when reusing the same seed
- Added some QOL Gecko Codes for the title screen
- Updated credits to specially thank Palex00, Scipio, Mysteryem and Exempt-Medic
0.1.2.title: SMSA2 Alpha 0.1.2

0.2.0.description:
- New Item! The Underwater Hover Nozzle from Noki Bay (called the Bubble Nozzle for brevity) is here! Enable it with the shuffle_bubble_nozzle setting and once obtained, use it with D-pad Down
- Fixed some issues regarding Universal Tracker implementation causing the Client to not open
- Fixed some minor logic issues
0.2.0.title: SMSA2 Alpha 0.2.0

0.3.0.description:
- New item! The Dive Helmet is a Useful class item that reduces the rate in which you lose air underwater
- New item! The Sunglasses are a Filler class item that gives you some snazzy shades (these don't apply the tint filter over your screen the way they do in Vanilla!)
- New item! The Shine Shirt is a Filler class item that gives you a cool cosmetic shirt!
0.3.0.title: SMSA2 Alpha 0.3.0

0.4.0.description:
- New Item! The Long Jump is a Useful class item that allows you to long jump! To use it, hold Z while running and jump. This does overwrite the map functionality, but it's not like it was useful in the first place.
- New Item! The Fruit Gummies is a Useful class item that allows Yoshi eggs to be opened without the requested fruit. A Yoshi egg opened with fruit gummies will produce a green Yoshi that shoots water.
- New Item! The Cap is a Filler class item that gives Mario his cap. When using the new shuffle_cap option, he will start the rando capless, but won't lose health over time the way he does in the base game. This functionality is planned to be added to a future item called Sunscreen.
- New Feature! Items are now grouped for hinting!
0.4.0.title: SMSA2 Alpha 0.4.0
